text: The men's individual competition of the triathlon events at the 2019 Pan American Games was held on July 27 at the Agua Dulce in Lima, Peru.Lima 2019 Pan American Games - Triathlon https://www.lima2019.pe/en/pan-american- sports/triathlon The defending Pan American Games champion is Reinaldo Colucci of Brazil. The Pan American Games triathlon contains three components; a swim, cycle, and a run. ==Schedule== All times are Peru Time (UTC-5). {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time !
